Uses of Class
io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.oceanus.decimal.OceanusMoney

Packages that use OceanusMoney
Package
Description
io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.metis.parser
Parsers.
io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.moneywise.tax.uk
UK Tax details.
io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.oceanus.decimal
Package that provides a Decimal implementation in many ways similar to that provided by BigDecimal, except that the class is mutable, allowing for much faster arithmetic.
io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.prometheus.database
Handles mapping to/from database.
io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.prometheus.service.sheet
Service definition for SpreadSheet PlugIns.
io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.prometheus.sheets
Prometheus sheets is a package that simply maps data-types to and from backup spreadsheets.
io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.tethys.api.chart
Chart API.
